meanings.definition: To manage or supervise the execution, use, or conduct of
meanings.sent1: The teacher will administer the class activities.
meanings.sent2: The principal administers the school's policies.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to administer the playtime of the dogs.
meanings.sent4: The queen bee administers the hive with precision.
meanings.sent5: The coach administers the team's training schedule diligently.

meanings.definition: To give or apply (a remedy or drug)
meanings.sent1: The nurse will administer the flu shot.
meanings.sent2: The doctor administers the prescribed medication.
meanings.sent3: The clown tried to administer laughter to the sad children.
meanings.sent4: The chef administers the secret ingredient to the dish.
meanings.sent5: The magician administers the magic potion to the audience.
